tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We had pre booked appointment i.e 8 sep 10 AM  for 22 month old baby Boy with Dr Maitri Chaudhuri @ Manipal Old airport hospital. Dr Maitri Chaudhuri  came(or Hiding some where in hospital. we don't know) around 11.45AM  but we were waited for more then 1 and half an Hours .We paid 750 consultant Fess for Dr Maitri chowdary.
Dr. Maitri Chaudhuri  asked us to consult with one of her Junior Dr. Yogesh. While he was taking input about my KID  in between Dr Maitri Chaudhuri  asked him to take our Kid to ECHO scanning.
We got surprised that Dr Maitri Chaudhuri  she not even seen my KID and simply took us to scanning room.
We spoke to Dr. Maitri Chaudhuri  saying that you not even see the reports of my  kid and directly asking us for ECHO scanning. Then she asked what is the problem your Kid having.
I told her one of our kid dr pediatric physician asked to consult with  Pediatric Cardiologist specialist  so we googled and found ur name for Murmur sound detect on our kid.
Then she asked me to show report i told we don;t have any report this is the first time showing pediatric Cardiologist specialist so we are expecting report from you.
Then she asked us you didn't Gogole about Murmur Sound .Yes i did But how that will help here .
Then she checked my kid like she is not even interest  and asked Jr Dr to fill the details.
 
We still not convinced with her consultation hence we are planning to take my KID to some other good prediatric Cardiologist specialist.

I have bad experience with the doctor, she didn't explain the things with patience she will show her attitude.

she didn't react immediately when the things are critical, she had explained different and she had reacted different when the situations are serious, she directed us for few tests/procedures ***** *** *** ********* and finally we lost the amount, we lost our kid and valuable time. She may not be completely responsible to loss my kid however if she would have reacted little advance my kid would have been survived that's what we feel, that was our hope.

review: I  was referred for fetal tachycardia by my gynecologist. Dr did a thorough fetal scan over 45 minutes and told me everything was OK. We took our child back after delivery and my son is now 3 years old. I appreciate her sincerity and dedication
